headline: Bank of America: In on stablecoins?
summary: Bank of America CEO Brian Moynihan said Wednesday that the country’s second-largest bank is going to take a look at stablecoins after key crypto legislation passes.

raw.headline: Bank of America: In on stablecoins?

headline: PNC Bank Launches PNC Mobile Accept®, A New Pay-As-You-Go Payment Processing Solution for Micro Businesses
summary: PNC Bank today announced the launch of PNC Mobile Accept®, a fully integrated payment solution that provides its micro business clients with the ability to accept in-person credit and debit card payments directly within the PNC Mobile app.

raw.headline: PNC Bank Launches PNC Mobile Accept®, A New Pay-As-You-Go Payment Processing Solution for Micro Businesses
raw.summary: PNC Bank today announced the launch of PNC Mobile Accept®, a fully integrated payment solution that provides its micro business clients with the ability to accept in-person credit and debit card payments directly within the PNC Mobile app.

headline: PNC Financial: Solid Fundamentals Reflected In Valuation
summary: PNC Financial's deposit and loan growth remain muted despite national expansion. Click here to find out why I view PNC stock as a Hold.
